# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Tells you when to initialize an audio node that has been unarchived.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder aDecoder: NSCoder)
```

```swift
init?(coder aDecoder: NSCoder)
```

## Discussion

Do not call this initializer directly; it’s called by the system when you should initialize an audio node that has been unarchived.

## Initializing Audio Nodes

- **init(avAudioNode:)**: Initializes an audio node from an AVFoundation audio node.
- **init(fileNamed:)**: Initializes an audio node from an audio asset with the specified filename.
- **init(url:)**: Initializes an audio node from an audio asset with the specified URL.
